Damping force selector
Multi-information display
JBL 14 speakers
Rear-view camera
New 20" Alloy design
mdata.expanded:
4 x Camera Multi-Terrain Monitor
Crawl Control with Off-road assist
Chrome finishes
Multi-terrain select
Tyre angle display
Off-road turn assist
HID front headlamps with LED daytime running lights
New front bumper and front grille design
Colour keyed side moulding with chrome inserts
Black roof rails

Side repeater integration with wing mirrors
mdata.xhtml:
The all new Land Cruiser V8 is one of the most powerful off roaders on the market; is packed with luxury, technology, safety and of course good looks:

Toyota Touch Pro Multimedia and Navigation System with Digital Radio, Bluetooth, Reversing Camera and 14 JBL speakers.
HID Headlamps with LED Daytime Running Lights (DRL)
A/C Ventilated Leather Seats
Smart Entry and Push Start
Independent four-zone climate control
Cool Box

mdata.expanded:
2 x 8" screens fitted to the front headrests
Side loading DVD, together with USB and SD card reader
